org.grouplens.lenskit.util.statistics

Class MutualInformationAccumulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.util.statistics.MutualInformationAccumulator

  • public class MutualInformationAccumulator
extends Object

    Accumulate mutual information over two discrete variables. Slightly incorrectly, this reports 0 as the entropy and mutual information of empty sets.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MutualInformationAccumulator(int n)
      Construct a new accumulator with equal-sized event spaces.
      MutualInformationAccumulator(int n1, int n2)
      Construct a new accumulator.
